math_unit_rate.title: Solve Unit Rate Problems
math_unit_rate.description: Learn to solve unit rate problems step by step using Snap! variables
math_unit_rate.overview: In this tutorial, you'll learn to solve unit rate problems like 'If 7 hours to mow 4 lawns, how many in 35 hours?' using Snap! blocks to show your work step by step.

steps.title: Set up variables
steps.description: Create variables to store the numbers from the problem
instructions: Set hours1 to 7, lawns1 to 4, hours2 to 35
steps.success_criteria: Variables are created and set with correct values

steps.title: Calculate unit rate
steps.description: Find how many hours per lawn
steps.success_criteria: Unit rate is calculated and displayed

steps.title: Find the answer
steps.description: Use unit rate to find total lawns
steps.success_criteria: Final answer is calculated and displayed
